Road Transport

Full Load Truck

Full truck loads are almost always the fastest and safest option to move heavy freight. This is true because only during loading and unloading will the goods be handled, and they will be on a specific vehicle.

Part Load Truck

PTL makes it simple to transport various items of clients in one vehicle. This enables numerous shippers to split their load and pay for the specific area that they occupy, making it an affordable way to move products.

Services We Provide

Land Transportation

We provide a wide range of land transportation services 24×7 to any location. Our efficient local and national land transportation service makes sure that items arrive on schedule and in good condition.

Full Load Truck

A sort of transportation method known as full truck load, or FTL, involves using a truck to transport only one specific product. In other words, just one shipment will be allowed on the trip. Less Than Truck Load (LTL), also known as a cargo of less than a full truckload, has a number of advantages over FTL trucking. Whole truckloads are more cost-effective for shipments that are large enough to completely or nearly completely fill a shipping container. Unlike courier transport or LTL, full truckloads are far less constrained by size and weight limits. FTL goods arrive at their destination faster since there are no other pickups or drops along the road for the vehicle. As there is no switching between vehicles in the middle of the journey while using FTL transport, the shipment is more likely to be lost or damaged.

Part Truck Load

PTL shipment occurs when your load requires a part truck’s space. A truck is used to convey numerous shipments to various shipping sites or logistical hubs while keeping them all together. You do not have to pay any fees to use the part load booking service. You only have to pay for the amount of your load. The shipment may be reloaded onto another vehicle during the part-load transportation process, and that truck will arrange delivery to the consignee’s warehouse. Regardless of the size of your delivery, C2C Logistic, one of the top road transport firms in India, keeps your supply chain going. Your part-load shipment will reach its intended location safely, promptly, and with our expert equipment.

Cargo Storage

A perfect warehousing firm offers a solution that is customised for your organisation and skilled staff to manage your inventory and orders. You don’t need to worry about your inventory or stocking requirements because of their knowledge. It gets simpler to give your main business your undivided attention. C2C is a top Logistic company in India, provides a wide selection of tech-based warehousing solutions that are all 100% customised to match the unique demands of your company.
